text: I faced discrimination, hatred, and internment because of my Japanese heritage, and because only a few people stood up for us. Today, Asian Americans are being unfairly labeled and attacked, this time as disease carriers. Raise your hand, friends, if you’ll stand up for us today.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio
